LanguageData.Bed_StoneSlab.label: slab bed
LanguageData.Bed_StoneSlab.description: A large slab of smoothed stone, very uncomfortable and only marginally better than sleeping on the floor.
LanguageData.Bed_Simple.label: simple bed
LanguageData.Bed_Simple.description: A somewhat comfy net and pillow rested on a sturdy frame.
